note: GDP is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices.
title: Changes in energy use vs. changes in GDP
subtitle: Consumption-based (trade-adjusted) [primary energy](#dod:primaryenergy) use measures domestic energy use minus energy used to produce exported goods, plus energy used to produce imported goods. Gross domestic product (GDP) is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries.
